platform.description: Best known platform, might be identical to scheduledPlatform

wingIds.description: MediumIds of journeys that are wings of this journey at this stop.

additional.description: Is this stop unplanned and additional?

cancelled.description: Is this stop cancelled for this journey?

productClass.description: Most likely D | N | S | F

departures.description: Journeys that have not yet departed (or arrived if they end here)

lookbehind.description: Journeys that have already departed (or arrived if they end here)

strike.description: amount of departures/arrivals that are affected by a strike [Streik]

Pick_SubscrChannel.channelId_.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

1 or 0 for each day, starts at monday
example: 1001001
Monday, Thursday, Sunday selected

initialDepartureDate.description: Used to find the correct journey for a specific day.

ushrp.description: Is a station nearby enough for routing?

ReturnType_typeofinfo_.description: Obtain the return type of a function type

class.description: 0: Unknown; 1: erste; 2: zweite; 3: 1&2; 4: Not for passengers

uic.description: only filled for real time information

direction.description:
true = in direction of first sector in array
false = in direction of last sector in array
undefined = we do not know

Pick_TrainRun.Exclude_keyofTrainRun.prim.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

TransportType.description: Type of transport. - HIGH_SPEED_TRAIN (High speed train [Hochgeschwindigkeitszug] like ICE or TGV etc.) - INTERCITY_TRAIN (Inter city train [Intercityzug]) - INTER_REGIONAL_TRAIN (Inter regional train [Interregiozug]) - REGIONAL_TRAIN (Regional train [Regionalzug]) - CITY_TRAIN (City train [S-Bahn]) - SUBWAY (Subway [U-Bahn]) - TRAM (Tram [Strassenbahn]) - BUS (Bus [Bus]) - FERRY (Ferry [Faehre]) - FLIGHT (Flight [Flugzeug]) - CAR (Car [Auto]) - TAXI (Taxi) - SHUTTLE (Shuttle [Ruftaxi]) - BIKE ((E-)Bike [Fahrrad]) - SCOOTER ((E-)Scooter [Roller]) - WALK (Walk ([Laufen]) - UNKNOWN (Unknown)

get.description: Used to get all arrivals at a specific stopPlace

Provides Auslstaung based on DB Vertrieb HAFAS (DB Navigator).
Based on a rough estimate, handles first and second class.

parameters.description: Planned Departure time of the stop you want the occpuancy for
parameters.name: plannedDepartureTime

get.description:
Used to get all departures at a specific stopPlace.
Optionally filterable to get only Journeys that travel via a specific stopPlace
This combines several HAFAS endpoint as well as IRIS data to get the best possible information for a specific journey.

parameters.description: EvaNumber of a stop of your train, might not work for profiles other than DB
parameters.name: station

parameters.description: This is the initialDepartureDate of your desired journey
parameters.name: date

500.description: Failed to fetch a journey for this tripId

get.description: This redirects to the current Details Page with a provided HAFAS TripId / JourneyId / JID
Can be used to find all stopPlaces within a radius around a specific geo location

post.description: Used to find a specific journey based on name, date and HAFAS filter.

get.description: provides Details for a specific Journey [Fahrt]

200.description: URL to DB, HVV or NAHSH Lageplan

get.description: Used to find the position of a specific journey. Based on predictions, not GPS.
Returns all journeys that run on a specific date. Only works for DB Fernverkehr

parameters.description: Used to filter for specific Baureihen
parameters.name: baureihen

parameters.description: Used to filter for specific identifier (identifier are defined by me, not DB)
parameters.name: identifier

parameters.description: Used to filter for runs that stop at specific stopPlaces in the specifed order
parameters.name: stopsAt

post.description: Advanced HAFAS Method, not used by marudor.de and therefore quite undocumented

parameters.description: Only returns stopPlaces iris-tts can handle (/abfahrten)
parameters.name: filterForIris

get.description: This might fall back to use HAFAS

parameters.description: Only returns stopPlaces iris-tts can handle (/abfahrten)
parameters.name: filterForIris

get.description:
Only uses this for non DB profiles. If you need DB stopPlace search use Operation tagged with StopPlace.
Used to search for stopPlaces based on a name.

parameters.description: S returns only StopPlaces, ALL also returns Point of Interests
parameters.name: type

get.description:
Currently only for VRR.
Source: https://github.com/derf/eva-to-efa-gw
Thanks derf.

post.description:
Used to find trips [Verbindungssuche]
A lot of the request options are raw HAFAS and not documented.

get.description:
Returns the coachSequence at a specific stop for a specific train.
Works for OEBB stops and DB stops.

Returns plannedSequence if no real time information is available

parameters.description: Departure at the stop you want the coachSequence for
parameters.name: departure

parameters.description: needed for OEBB Reihung, usually 7 digits
parameters.name: evaNumber

tags.name: HAFAS
tags.description: All Operation use a HAFAS backend. By default it will be the HAFAS backend by DB Vertrieb (DB Navigator). Different backends can be selected by providing the query paramter profile.
